params.name: feature_size
params.description: The feature dimension of the extracted features.

params.name: sampling_rate
params.description: The sampling rate at which the audio files should be digitalized expressed in hertz (Hz).

params.name: hop_length
params.description: Length of the overlaping windows for the STFT used to obtain the Mel Frequency coefficients.

params.name: chunk_length
params.description: The maximum number of chunks of sampling_rate samples used to trim and pad longer or shorter audiosequences.

params.name: num_chroma
params.description: Number of chroma bins to use.

params.name: padding_value
params.description: Padding value used to pad the audio.

params.name: return_attention_mask
params.description: Whether to return the attention mask. Can be overwritten when calling the feature extractor.What are attention masks?For Whisper models, attention_mask should always be passed for batched inference, to avoid subtlebugs.

params.name: stem_indices
params.description: Stem channels to extract if demucs outputs are passed.
